title: Brand New House for Sale in Nittambuwa.
details:
2 storeid fully tiled house situated at Wathupitiwala Road, Nittambuwa, just 100 m to Kandy road. Around 2,000 Sq.Ft with 4 bedrooms, 2 attached bath rooms, pantry kitchen, servant toilet, parapet wall. Over 20 ft wide private lane. Less than 5 minutes drive to Nittambuwa town. 10 Perches land
Situated in a quiet residential area. Less than 100 meters to Kandy road. Very close to Export Processing Zone and Wathupitiwala Base Hospital.
